lead_paragraph: Isaiah Thomas scored 22 points and the Boston Celtics held off a furious rally in the fourth quarter to beat the Chicago Bulls 110-101 on Friday night.

headline.print_headline: Thomas Scores 22, Celtics Hold Off Late Bulls Rally 110-101
headline.main: Thomas Scores 22, Celtics Hold Off Late Bulls Rally 110-101

snippet: Isaiah Thomas scored 22 points and the Boston Celtics held off a furious rally in the fourth quarter to beat the Chicago Bulls 110-101 on Friday night....
